data.comment: The match is underway in Madrid.
In Madrid Elche attack through Raul Guti. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 2, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Atletico a goal kick.
Luis Suarez for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 8, Throw-in for Elche in the half of Atletico.
Attention is being given to Atleticoâ€™s Renan Lodi and play has been suspended briefly.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in Elche.
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Elche.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
In the minute 14, Free kick Atletico.
Atletico's Renan Lodi is back in action after a slight knock.
Gonzalo Verdu (Elche) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 15, Goal kick for Elche at Wanda Metropolitano.
Atletico to take a throw-in in Elche territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
In the minute 17, Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Elche's half?
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 20, Atletico's Marcos Llorente gets in a shot on goal at Wanda Metropolitano. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Throw-in high up the field for Atletico in Madrid.
Corner awarded to Atletico.
In the minute 25, Atletico's Yannick Carrasco misses with an attempt on goal.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
In the minute 29, Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Elche needs to be cautious. Atletico have an attacking throw-in.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico.
In the minute 31, Atletico pushes forward through Thomas Lemar, whose finish on goal is saved.
Throw-in for Elche at Wanda Metropolitano.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Atletico throw-in in Elche's half.
In the minute 34, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Atletico throw-in in Elche's half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
Atletico have a goal kick.
In the minute 36, Atletico are coming forward and Luis Suarez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Goal kick for Elche at Wanda Metropolitano.
Atletico are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 39, Atletico's Joao Felix gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Elche a goal kick.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 40, Free kick for Elche in the half of Atletico.
Mario Hermoso for Atletico has been booked by Xavier Estrada Fernandez and receives a first yellow card.
Luis Suarez puts the ball in the net and the home team now lead 1-0.
In the minute 41, Kieran Trippier instrumental with a fine assist.
Atletico have a dangerous throw-in.
Marcos Llorente for Atletico gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 44, Ball goes out of play for a Elche goal kick.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Elche close to the penalty box.
In the minute 45, 2 minutes of injury time will be added to the 1st half.
Atletico have a goal kick.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico.
In the minute 45, Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
The first-half is over at Wanda Metropolitano.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
In the minute 46, Jorge Almiron is making the team's first substitution at Wanda Metropolitano with Juan Sanchez Mino replacing John Nwankwo Donald.
Jorge Almiron (Elche) is making a second substitution, with Emiliano Rigoni replacing Josan.
In Madrid Atletico drive forward through Joao Felix. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 48, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a throw-in for Atletico, close to Elche's area.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Elche in their own half.
In the minute 50, Free kick Atletico.
Elche awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Can Atletico capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Elche's half?
In the minute 54, Elche push upfield and Raul Guti gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Atletico defence.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Elche.
Throw-in for Atletico close to the penalty box.
In the minute 55, Atletico's Thomas Lemar breaks free at Wanda Metropolitano. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Atletico are pushing forward but Yannick Carrasco's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 57, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Elche a goal kick.
Goal! Luis Suarez extends Atletico's lead to 2-0.
Great play from Yannick Carrasco to set up the goal.
In the minute 60, Elche are caught offside.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
In the minute 62, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a throw-in for Elche, close to Atletico's area.
The match at Wanda Metropolitano has been interrupted briefly for a check on Renan Lodi, who is down injured.
Elche have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
In the minute 64, Lucas Boye (Elche) strikes with a header to reduce the deficit to 2-1 at Wanda Metropolitano.
Tete Morente with an assist there.
Atletico's Renan Lodi looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 65, Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Angel Correa is on a sub for Thomas Lemar for Atletico.
In the minute 66, Saul Niguez is replacing Yannick Carrasco for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
Can Elche get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
Antonio Barragan of Elche gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 68, Ball goes out of play for a Atletico goal kick.
Ball safe as Elche is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Atletico have a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Play has been interrupted briefly in Madrid to check on Joao Felix, who is grimacing with pain.
The home team replace Joao Felix with Diego Costa.
In the minute 74, Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
The home team have replaced Luis Suarez with Geoffrey Kondogbia. This is the fourth substitution made today by Diego Simeone.
Elche drives forward and Lucas Boye gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Corner awarded to Elche.
In the minute 76, Elche have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
Raul Guti of Elche gets in a strike, but is off target.
Goal kick for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 77, A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Throw-in for Atletico close to the penalty box.
An attacking Atletico player has been brought down in the area - penalty!
In the minute 79, Ivan Marcone (Elche) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
It's now 3-1 to Atletico as Diego Costa scores from the spot.
Jorge Almiron is making the team's third substitution at Wanda Metropolitano with Nino replacing Raul Guti.
In the minute 82, Free kick Elche.
Atletico needs to be cautious. Elche have an attacking throw-in.
Free kick for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in for Elche in their own half.
Elche to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
Can Elche capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 85, Corner awarded to Elche.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 87, Elche awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico make their fifth substitution with Felipe replacing Koke.
Throw-in Atletico.
The 2nd half is prolonged by 4 minutes of added time.
Elche to take a throw-in in Atletico territory.
Can Elche capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Atletico's half?
Throw-in high up the field for Elche in Madrid.
Elche are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
Free kick for Elche in the half of Atletico.
